reference.title: cxxStructDefinition
reference.shortdesc: Contains child elements giving details of a C++ struct definition.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxStructDefinition> element is defined within <cxxStructDetail>. The child element <cxxStructAPIItemLocation> is mandatory. The child element <cxxStructAccessSpecifier> can indicate the access modifier applied to the members of the struct.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxStructDefinition> <cxxStructAccessSpecifier value="public"/> <cxxStructDerivations> <cxxStructDerivation> <cxxStructDerivationAccessSpecifier value="public"/> <cxxStructBaseStruct href="struct_c_base.xml#struct_c_base">CBase</cxxStructBaseStruct> </cxxStructDerivation> </cxxStructDerivations> <cxxStructAPIItemLocation> <cxxStructDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="C:/src/include/e32base.h"/> <cxxStructDeclarationFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="2784"/> <cxxStructDeclarationFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="2854"/> </cxxStructAPIItemLocation> </cxxStructDefinition>
